item.title: Production of thermal management system with Raspberry Pi and ESP32 (2) Transmission device production
item.description: Creating a device that sends temperature and humidity data to a Raspberry Pi. Overall layout Parts are soldered to the universal board. ##circuit Connect SHT31 and ssd1306 in parallel with i2c. That said, just connect the four lines in parallel. Easy easy. Confirm i2c address Once the wiring is decided, check the address on the breadboard. Code referenced this page. Run the code and note the address that came out.
